section.title: sales credits printing of Print Sales Credits
section.para: Printing a Sales Credit is a required step in the process of posting a Sales Credit. To print a Sales Credit, select the "Print Sales Credits" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing Sales Credits, you are presented with the following options:

note.para: If the Customer specified on a Sales Credit has an EDI Profile attached, you may encounter an EDI processing interface when printing it.

listitem.para: Select to automatically post Sales Credits after they have been printed.

note.para: Sales Credits are posted effective on the date they are distributed, not on the date they are postedâ€”as might be assumed.
